data.message: So the thing is when people don't do their jobs in the government I am hell of rude... can I conduct myself better hell yeah I was a business coach I am trying to understand what happens when a normal person actually uses their normal emotions in the system when going through something this extreme so I do hold back but I try not to repress myself too much cause a. That means they have strong armed me. And b. I need to know what being honest and real gets you in the system.
